description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Orbiting high above the Earth’s atmosphere, a secret war rages on over control of the world's communication satellites. While the rest of the population below remains oblivious, you are put in charge of commanding these satellites.
description.short: Orbiting high above the Earth’s atmosphere, a secret war rages on over control of the world's communication satellites. While the rest of the population below remains oblivious, you are put in charge of commanding these satellites.
